entries.title: Senior Product Designer
entries.description: As a multi-disciplinary designer with over a decade at Orium (formerly Myplanet), I've collaborated with high-performing teams to create engaging user experiences and empower customers to connect with their audience. Orium values empathy, collaboration, flexibility, and humanity, and I've played a key role in its evolution. I've partnered with diverse teams and clients to craft beautiful designs and ensure rigorous Design QA standards. Recently, I've focused on Design Advocacy, bridging functional gaps, implementing shared token languages, and enhancing tool visibility. Our teams aim for cross-functional excellence. My hands-on approach in designing and coding on production projects ensures full polish and improves team communication. By refining my expertise in UI development and front-end polish, I've driven innovation and shaped new learning approaches within the organization.
entries.callout: I'm a design advocate, bridging functional gaps, implementing shared token languages, and enhancing tool visibility. I drive innovation and shape new learning approaches within the organization.

entries.title: Mindfulness Facilitator
entries.description: Self-awareness and empathy are central to my personal and professional journey. In my role as Mindfulness Lead, I have facilitated and mentored others in mindfulness practices, through guided meditation and onboarding sessions. Mindful breaks, which are always optional, are a staple in our culture, serving as reminders to do the things that support personal well-being. These practices allow us to reflect on what it means to work and live, fostering a healthier and more balanced workplace environment.
entries.callout: I'm one of many day-to-day mindfulness ambassadors promoting good-vibes and fostering emotional intelligence on multi-disciplinary teams.

entries.description: This section will contain a concise description of my responsibilities and achievements during my tenure as a UX Designer at University Health Network.

entries.title: UI Designer
entries.description:
THIS IS HTML - need to fix ol style!!! During my tenure as a UI Designer (Fellow) at Orium, I embarked on a transformative learning experience for students, recent graduates, and career changers. Collaborated with aspiring student designers to craft product pitches and interfaces, gaining real-world expertise in UI design. Honed user-centric design skills and embraced team collaboration, setting a solid foundation for future growth.

  • Unique learning opportunity for students, recent graduates, and career changers.
  • Collaborated with aspiring student designers on product pitches and interfaces.
  • Real-world experience in UI design and team collaboration.
  • Emphasized user-centric design principles.
  • Fostered creativity and collaboration.
  • Honed skills in ideation, iteration, and UI design.
  • Contributed to nurturing the next generation of design talent.
